Hey guys,

I was considering posting a pic of my pathetic little space station and ask a question about how to remove or work on an unwanted bit but can't find anything on how to add a screen shot to a post.

I've had a look in some threads and done a search but I really have the attention span of a....... oh, when I flushed the motor on my boat did I remember to hook up the battery charger?

So anyway, I did a search for 'adding pics' and 'screenshots' but like most forums I'm on it turned up loads of threads that just distracted me even more.

Anyway thanks again for any answers,... wow, these chips are delicious.

Henno

You upload your pictures to an image hosting site like imgur.com and then copy the 'BBCode' link you get there into your post.

Basically, all you need is a link to a picture with img tags around it.

It should look something like this, only without the spaces:

[ img ]*image url*[ /img ]
